attributes.action: allow each person the right to diplomatic immunity on his/her birthday for the exact time period of the 24 hours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We at DIB4U (diplomaticly immune birthdays 4 u) believe that each and every one of us should be entitled to be a complete and utter prick on there birthday. especially when getting older and you feel like your gone over the hill, you need to something to make you feel young again.
here are some of the things you might want to do if you had diplomatically immune birthday:
Slap a policeman,
throw badgers at a farmer,
walk into a bank naked, holding a goat,
run riot with a shotgun,
chew vigourously on cabbage,
smoke too much opium and pass out,
consume 24 pounds of cheese and halucinate whilst bungee jumping from the roof of the eiffel tower,
limp with both legs,
ignore school children whilst driving,
steal an ice cream van and drive it to brighton.

we also suggest that each member gets a free hat and a cup of mama's best cat.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
